1. EXT4 org
    Registrar: Dynadot / Expiry: 19th June 2020 / BIN: $50

  2. BOOTP net
    Registrar: Dynadot / Expiry: 21st July 2020 / BIN: $50

  3. KVMVPS net
    Registrar: Dynadot / Expiry: 22nd June 2020 / BIN: $50

  4. Transmits org
    Registrar: Dynadot / Expiry: 6th August 2020 / BIN: $50

Bidding starts at $5 for each domain name, with a bid increment of $1 (minimum).

Bid on the number and do not post the domain name. (eg: #1 - $1)

During the auction period, if someone claims the BIN for any of these domain names at their BIN price, it will outbid any existing bids that has been placed, thus ending the auction for the domain name.

Domains can be transferred via 2 methods:

  1. It can be pushed within Dynadot via Dynadot Forum Name.
  2. EPP/AUTH code will be provided to the winner should the winner choose to have the domain name transferred out of Dynadot, to a different registrar. Winner takes the cost for the transfer.

Payment Method: PayPal
Auction Ends: Tuesday, 22 October 2019, 22:00 (CEST) - Countdown Timer
